attributes.action: ensure that television coverage of the Paralympics in 2012 is equal to that of the Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that in this day and age of Equality and Diversity, disability sport should be given more coverage on television. I would like to see the Paralymic events occur at the same time as the Olympic ones but as this is asking the impossible, I will settle for better television coverage.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure that television coverage of the Paralympics in 2012 is equal to that of the Olympics."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21839
